ygData.subject: Re: This is about research!  sheesh
ygData.msgSnippet: Your making me go there aren t you. Yes I play D&D and yes 10 20th level Chars with intelligent prep, heck even 6 with intelligent prep, good equip, and
ygData.messageBody:
Your making me go there aren't you. Yes I play D&D and yes 10 20th level
Chars with intelligent prep, heck even 6 with intelligent prep, good
equip, and tactics would murder any lich for hell or other wise...Please
stop making me go there...

Matthew Tucker wrote:
>
> From: "Matthew Tucker" <tucker_01@...>
>
> This reply was NOT necessary...you are a jerk and should be removed from
> this list...this is about spell research not flaming someone. If you would
> have actually read this post you you garner exactly what hes saying...the
> spells should not have been able to go unresisted. Have you ever played
> dungeons and dragons? What would happen if you had a group of 10 mid level
> (15-20) characters and they went and fought the arch-magi lich from hell?
> Well they would most likely run from the fear...die to the cold and get
> eatin alive by his spells...sheesh get a life.
>
> Ok on to the spell research:
>
> My roommate just made 17th level and has failed his first few researches
> (this cost some plat!) Is there a list of runes a wizard can combine or
> possibily a list of what spells to create? Thanks!
>
> >From: Lakecya Smith <widdowsson@...>
> >Reply-To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
> >To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
> >Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Enchanters and Research (Bersker Str)
> >Date: Wed, 19 May 1999 17:00:12 -0400
> >
> >From: Lakecya Smith <widdowsson@...>
> >
> >Trev wrote:
> > >
> > > I'm amazed you could get spells through on a Griffon or HG at that
> >level. Both of these are level 30+ monsters. Accordingly I wouldn't think a
> >level 18-20 group should be able to get one spell through. Certainly with
> >my Wizard if it's more that a couple levels higher than me I don't even
> >bother casting as it will get resisted fully.
> > >
> > > Unless I misread your post, I think it only prudent that Verant change
> >this. There's no way a group of 18-20 lvl players, regardless of class,
> >should be taking down monsters that are double their level. That's a tad
> >extreme.
> > >
> > > Trev
> > > Oh my god I think I'm haveing a coniption (Must.... control.. Fist of
> >....DEATH!) Why on earth (or Norrath for that matter) would you support
> >Verant makeing it even harder for people to advance and have fun. By saying
> >something as innane and anal as that, you stifle team work and the desire
> >and adventure to try something more. To be dareing & adventurious is that
> >not what it's all about? People like you who condone such changes that
> >FURTHER hamper the fun, ease, and playabilty for gamers should be forced to
> >play Smurf warriors in Splitpaw or something. See, what retarted petty
> >people like you forget is WE PAY VERANT'S BILLS. and thus the game should
> >be free of the kind of asinine restrictions that you would have further
> >placed upon the game. Futher more, you say that it's unreasonable that a
> >party of 18-20th level char take down a level 30 creature?!?!?! IDIOT!, If
> >your a grown man (which I highly doubt) and 6 trained 12 yr olds come at
> >you with sharpened Katanas (not to me!
> >ntion SPELLS!) they would kill you even if you did have a sword you would
> >be swarmed and KILLED, as would a lion or even bear sure 1 or 2 may die (as
> >char commonly do in the aformentioned sitiuation. but the higher level
> >tougher creature WOULD DIE!. So take your petty, anal, Triffling mentality,
> >that would have us all struggleing even more for the modest exp we can
> >already just barely gain, To Hell (or Lavastorm in a pinch) and DIE!
> >
> >We need not further restrictions but, benefits to make it more fun,
> >
> >The Widows Son,
> >Vastad
> >Enchanter Cazic -Thule
